title: Wages, Salaries and Other Payments to Employees for United States
notes:
These Payments Cover Pensions, Compensation For Injury, And Relief Payments In The Groups "Transportation And Public Utilities" And "Government" (Social Securities Paid By Employers Are Included). Source: Simon Kuznets, National Income And Its Composition, 1919-1938, (NBER No. 40) 1941, Volume I, Table 57, Pp. 322-323.

This NBER data series a08181a appears on the NBER website in Chapter 8 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter08.html.

NBER Indicator: a08181a
